title: Better Recommendations: Validating AI-generated Subject Terms Through LOC Linked Data Service
abstract: This article explores the integration of AI-generated subject terms into library cataloging, focusing on validation through the Library of Congress Linked Data Service. It examines the challenges of traditional subject cataloging under the Library of Congress Subject Headings system, including inefficiencies and cataloging backlogs.
